DOC.brief_summary: Breech presentation ( baby present foot bottom ) increase risk perinatal neonatal complication , usually deliver cesarean section . As alternative , baby deliver vaginally , attempt make turn baby head : manoeuvre call external cephalic version ( ECV ) . Drugs relax uterus ( tocolytic agent ) sometimes use help improve ECV success rate . Nitroglycerin tocolytic agent , intravenous nitroglycerin test agent help ECV . There suggestion nitroglycerin may helpful woman previously pregnant ( nulliparous woman ) woman pregnant ( multiparous woman ) , plan two trial . This study design answer follow question multiparous woman : Will administration IV nitroglycerin uterine relaxation improve ECV success rate ? Will increase ECV success result decrease cesarean section rate ?
DOC.brief_title: Intravenous ( IV ) Nitroglycerin Versions Multiparous Women
DOC.criteria: noncephalic presentation singleton pregnancy > /= 37 week gestational age normal amniotic fluid volume reassure fetal heart rate labor rupture membrane history third trimester bleed preexist uterine scar pregnancy induce hypertension gestational diabetes oligohydramnios polyhydramnios intrauterine growth restriction macrosomia hypotension serious medical illness inability comprehend consent form
